text: @here, Any other keyboard shortcuts you might like to see implemented?
Any other custom preferences you think would be valuable to your workflow?
<@U7B0M5QSG>, you talking about when previewing a module or Global Group?
a custom module using the design previewer. Didn't know you could preview a global group O_o

one like this: up+up+down+down+left+right+left+right+B+A
(enter it on <https://www.jerrysfoods.com/> )
when I built that site I and another developer added that as an easter egg. it used to allow you to play the full contra video game. :smile:

Idea  for custom modules - it would be super awesome if we could use HubL as the default value for a text input.

Reason and use case: I’m building a team member grid module and while I need first name and last name separate because you will be able to sort by first names or last names.  The repeater field’s “Object sorting label” I want to show both the first and last names.

My idea to solve this was - add a new field called “full name” with “prevent editing in content editors” enabled, and the default text set to {{module.team_member.first_name}} {{module.team_member.last_name}}

And then the “object sorting label” would be set to my full name field instead.
in the custom module editor the number field has a bug where if you try to set the “max” to be more than 999 it clears the contents of the field. I don’t see any reason for this.
